content: Wood/lumber circular saw blade Standard circular saw blade for fast cutting in construction wood and timber ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features Aggressive tooth setting – engineered to cut faster through construction timber General purpose blade with strong body and aggressive tooth setting for fast cuts in construction timber. Versatile – you can cut timber, drywall and fiber cement boards with the same blade Applications Everyday rip- and cross-cutting Sawing through wood with nails Cutting lumber, construction timber, solid wood (hard and soft) Cutting wooden boards (plywood, formwork, OSB, chip) Cutting abrasive boards (gypsum, fiberboard, fiber cement) ### TECHNICAL DATA: Blade features: Fast cut, Economic Blade diameter: 7.25 in Number of teeth: 24 Technical Data | Blade features | Fast cut, Economic | Blade diameter | 7.24 in | Number of teeth | 24 | Product Class | Standard ### ITEMS- 2191165 - Circ. saw blade P CON 7 1/4 T24 - Package Size 10 pc - 3595394 - Master Carton - Circ. saw blade P CON 7 1/4 T24 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 50x Circ. saw blade P CON 7 1/4 T24 - 3595395 - Starter Pack Circ. Saw blade - SPX Frami - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 40x Circ. saw blade P CON 7 1/4 T24 - 10x Circ. saw blade SCBW FR SPX 7-1/4 A (5)
